name: CrazyTV
description:
"Be careful where you sleep, the nightmares are everywhere." Concept

You just slept on the couch while watched some trash terror film. Now the monster wants to get you, in your dreams! Destroy the TV spirit and take back the control of your precious TV using your controller to destroy the monsters it summons.

How to play?

You need destroy the monsters to inflict damage on the TV ghost. Each monster appears with a number (1, 2 or 3) that you need to press when the red mouse is on top of the monster cursor. Pay attention on the enemies,they can try trick you with wrong  or hidding numbers to create confuse in you or take the control of your controler . Press the number 4 to frustrate the monster's plans.

Team

André Theophillo - Monster Artist
